class.name: BoxShape3D
class.brief_description: A 3D box shape used for physics collision.
class.description: A 3D box shape, intended for use in physics. Usually used to provide a shape for a [CollisionShape3D]. [b]Performance:[/b] [BoxShape3D] is fast to check collisions against. It is faster than [CapsuleShape3D] and [CylinderShape3D], but slower than [SphereShape3D].

members.member: The box's width, height and depth.
